## Introduction

In this section, we will walk you through the creation of an R package from scratch. 

Suppose for example that you are working on late employees and you would like to make preditions, based on simulated data, on how late your employees will be. By doing so, you can for example estimate the number of minutes you will loose next year due to your employees delay.
